lead_paragraph: The company said to expect as much as $1.25 billion in operating income for the fourth quarter and as little as nothing, a remarkably wide range.

headline.print_headline: Amazon Projects $1.25 Billion Operating Income, or None
headline.main: Amazon Comes Up Short on Profits, Focusing on Warehouses and Movies

snippet: The company said to expect as much as $1.25 billion in operating income for the fourth quarter and as little as nothing, a remarkably wide range....
abstract: Amazon reports lower quarterly earnings than analysts had projected, sending stock down more than 5 percent.
